body: I did this as a value since I expect this constructor to be called with an rvalue argument, so the actual operation is going to be 1 move out of that object. I looked through the compiler output and that seems to be what's happening, in fact it moved directly out of the tail call in `getPythonInterpreterStackTrace` into the member. Thoughts?
